item.title: Officials clear building at US Naval Academy following reports of threats
item.description: Officials say authorities are clearing a building at the United States Naval Academy in Maryland after reports of threats made to the military school

item.title: Trump threatened Portland with troops to quell protests. The mayor says it's not needed
item.description: President Donald Trump has threatened sending the National Guard to Portland, Oregon, to quell protests

item.title: As AI tools reshape education, schools struggle with how to draw the line on cheating
item.description: High school and college educators say that student use of artificial intelligence has become so widespread that they need to rethink how to assign and...

item.title: Things to know about the bribery prosecution of ex-Sen. Bob Menendez and his wife, Nadine Menendez
item.description: The sentencing of Nadine Menendez has brought to a close a prosecution that focused on the years after she met then-Sen. Bob Menendez in 2018

item.title: Historically Black colleges issue lockdown orders, cancel classes after receiving threats
item.description: At least six historically Black colleges and universities received threats or “potential” threats Thursday, prompting lockdowns and class cancellation...
